title: Ledger Billing
description: A web application designed for small-scale businesses to efficiently manage their operations. It tracks customer and supplier details, records transactions, monitors due balances, and manages product inventory.

title: Sajilo Lekha
description: An advanced version of Ledger Billing, this application enhances business management by generating income statements and balance sheets. It offers comprehensive financial insights for informed decision-making.

title: Digital Nagarpalika
description: Digital Palika is for management of municipal activities, It maintains digital profiles, encompassing personal, educational, and professional information. It facilitates administrative tasks and  monitors development activities.
